::DarkMouse::

She looked at Drillbit."He's not here and we don't know when he shall 
return. I'm sorry. I know you wanted to talk to him."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Well, you're both very welcome."
> DrillBit was glad, it seamed he had been excepted, by everone but
> Megatron.
> "Do you two know where I can find Megatron?"
